title: Early returns indicate Hokie Nation's excitement for upcoming Virginia Tech Football season - VT hokiesports.com
content: Early returns indicate Hokie Nation's excitement for upcoming Virginia Tech Football season  VT hokiesports.com
description: It has been a little less than two weeks since initial ticket offerings were made available for Virginia Tech Football's upcoming 2022 campaign, and the response from Tech fans indicates a strong desire to pack Lane Stadium this fall for the Hokies' first season under new head coach Brent Pry.
